name: World of Warships: Legends — Credits cache
name_original: World of Warships: Legends — Credits cache
description:
You've found a cache chock-full of credits! Add this precious haul, along with some Premium Account time, Boosters, and Commander XP, to your Port.

This bundle includes: - 5 days of Premium Account - 1,000,000 credits - 25x Rare Credit Boosters - 25x Rare Universal Battle Boosters - 37,000 Commander XP

Please note: content such as Boosters, Commander XP, Camouflages, etc., only become visible upon reaching a specific account level in the game.
